title: What is the impact of the DVD player on your society? - Quora

response.answer_text: In the years before Blu-ray disc and online high-def streaming, DVD movies brought audiences such as myself closer to our favorite movies and allowed us to not only experience the films with superior picture quality on top-tier televisions and theater-quality sound, but enjoy state-of-the-art interactive DVD menus and explore never-before-seen (or rare) bonus features. Also, unlike videocassette and Laserdisc, DVDs could pause without any loss of picture quality and didn’t have to be rewound after the movie was over. It basically introduced the world to digital movies and TV in the same way CDs introduced them to digital high-resolution (at the time) music.
